sentences.en: He desperately dodged a speeding car trying to run him down.
sentences.cn: 他拼命地闪身躲开一辆试图撞倒他的疾驰的汽车。

sentences.en: He desperately needed cash to bail out the ailing restaurant.
sentences.cn: 他急需现金使经营惨淡的餐馆走出困境。

sentences.en: He looked round desperately for someone to help him.
sentences.cn: 他绝望地四处张望，希望有人来帮他。

sentences.en: He was found desperately trying to untangle several reels of film.
sentences.cn: 他被撞见拼命想要解开几盘缠在一起的胶卷。

sentences.en: Her marriage is in trouble and she is desperately unhappy.
sentences.cn: 她的婚姻陷入困境，她为此非常郁闷。

sentences.en: His gross misman-agement left the company desperately in need of restructuring.
sentences.cn: 他管理上的重大失误使公司陷入亟须重组的境地。

sentences.en: I struggled with my bags, desperately looking for a porter.
sentences.cn: 我提着行李艰难地走着，迫切地寻找着搬运工。

sentences.en: I think she feels desperately wounded and unloved at the moment.
sentences.cn: 我想她此刻定会觉得受到了极大的伤害，无人关爱。

sentences.en: I think she feels desperately wounded and unloved.
sentences.cn: 我想她觉得受到了莫大的伤害，无人爱她。

sentences.en: It really is desperately unfortunate that this should have happened just now.
sentences.cn: 刚才竟发生这样的事儿，实在是太不合时宜了。

sentences.en: Lewis desperately needs to keep clear of Ruddock's big left hook.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯无论如何得躲开拉多克凌厉的左钩拳才行。

sentences.en: Scores of people tried desperately to gatecrash the party.
sentences.cn: 很多不速之客拼命想要挤进这个聚会。

sentences.en: The banks are now desperately scrabbling to recover their costs.
sentences.cn: 那些银行正在拼命急于收回成本。

sentences.en: The doctors tried desperately to save her life.
sentences.cn: 医生们不惜一切挽救她的生命。

sentences.en: The Ministry desperately tried to hush up the whole affair.
sentences.cn: 部里拼命想隐瞒整个事件。

sentences.en: They grappled desperately for control of the weapon.
sentences.cn: 他们疯狂扭打，想把武器抢到手。

sentences.en: Thousands are desperately trying to leave their battered homes.
sentences.cn: 成千上万的人不顾一切地想要离开他们千疮百孔的家园。

words.tran_cn: 不顾一切的；令人绝望的；极度渴望的
绝望的境地；不顾一切拼命

trans.tran_cn: 绝望地，不顾一切地，<口>极度地，猛烈地
